banner.intro: I'm a 24 years old web developer and designer from Italy. My specialities include HTML, CSS and Javascript, but I have a passion for React and its logic. I've devoted more than a year to studying, completing over 50 projects and collaborations. Currently looking for my first position as Frontend Developer/React Developer, I'm curious to learn new languages and remain open to any learning opportunities.
